## ZoomControls class

Class for a zoom controls.  Blockly.ZoomControls

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class ZoomControls implements IPositionable 
```
<b>Implements:</b> [IPositionable](./blockly.ipositionable.md)

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [createDom()](./blockly.zoomcontrols.createdom.md) |  | Create the zoom controls.  The zoom controls SVG group. |
|  [dispose()](./blockly.zoomcontrols.dispose.md) |  | Disposes of this zoom controls. Unlink from all DOM elements to prevent memory leaks. |
|  [getBoundingRectangle()](./blockly.zoomcontrols.getboundingrectangle.md) |  | Returns the bounding rectangle of the UI element in pixel units relative to the Blockly injection div.  The UI elements's bounding box. Null if bounding box should be ignored by other UI elements. |
|  [init()](./blockly.zoomcontrols.init.md) |  | Initializes the zoom controls. |
|  [position(metrics, savedPositions)](./blockly.zoomcontrols.position.md) |  | Positions the zoom controls. It is positioned in the opposite corner to the corner the categories/toolbox starts at. |
